hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Mirror Shield#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Blue Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ GS Falling Spikes Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Zora Tunic#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #an Ice Trap# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
